author: Jeremy Berke and Morgan McFall-Johnsen
title: The US now has the world's biggest coronavirus outbreak — its case total just surpassed China's
description: Confirmed cases of coronavirus in the US have surpassed China and Italy, making the US the center of the outbreak. The US has now recorded 82,353 coronavirus cases, compared with 81,782 in China. Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories. Confirmed c…
content:
Confirmed cases of the novel coronavirus in the US have topped the totals in China and Italy, making the US the epicenter of the global outbreak.
Confirmed cases in the US hit 82,353 on Thursday evening, surpassing China at 81,782 and Italy at 80,589. The to… [+1800 chars]
